entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[exception:FileNotFoundError] Instance validation exception: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'D:/DJT/Documents/GitHub/davidtauriello/dqc_us_rules/dqc_us_rules/dqc-2019-V13-ruleset.zip', instance: puyi-20190630.xml - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1750264/000121390019020272/puyi-20190630.xml Traceback (most recent call last): File "Z:\Users\arelle\hfdev\arelle\Validate.py", line 113, in validate File "Z:\Users\arelle\hfdev\arelle\ValidateXbrl.py", line 521, in validate File "C:\Program Files\Arelle\plugin\xule\__init__.py", line 870, in xuleValidate runXule(_cntlr, _options, val.modelXbrl, xule_validator['map_name']) File "C:\Program Files\Arelle\plugin\xule\__init__.py", line 799, in runXule rule_set.open(rule_set_location, open_packages=not getattr(options, 'xule_bypass_packages', False)) File "C:\Program Files\Arelle\plugin\xule\XuleRuleSet.py", line 105, in open file_object = self._get_rule_set_file_object() File "C:\Program Files\Arelle\plugin\xule\XuleRuleSet.py", line 147, in _get_rule_set_file_object file_object = file_source.file(self.location, binary=True)[0] File "Z:\Users\arelle\hfdev\arelle\FileSource.py", line 493, in file File "Z:\Users\arelle\hfdev\arelle\FileSource.py", line 653, in openFileStream FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'D:/DJT/Documents/GitHub/davidtauriello/dqc_us_rules/dqc_us_rules/dqc-2019-V13-ruleset.zip'
